DOC.brief_summary: The study primarily investigate whether Treximet® ( Imitrex RT/naproxen sodium 500mg ) take first onset menstrual migraine terminate acute headache assist prevent headache recurrence need repeat abortive therapy ensue day menses .
DOC.brief_title: An Investigation Safety Utility Treximet Treatment Menstrual Migraine
DOC.criteria: 1 . Actively regularly cycling female age 19 year great . 2 . Normal ( subject ) menses within 6 week prior randomization 3 . History migraine ≤ 1 year duration International Classification Headache Disorders ( ICHD ) criteria 4 . History menstrual migraine ICHD criterion 1 . Not actively practice adequate contraception intend continue treatment . 2 . 15 day headache prior 3 month 3 . Prior use Treximet treatment menstrual migraine 4 . Uncontrolled hypertension 5 . Hemiplegic basilar migraine 6 . Clinical evidence coronary artery disease clinically significant relevant cardiac disease ( e.g . vasospastic angina ) 7 . History stroke transient ischemic attack 8 . History ischemic bowel disease 9 . Clinically significant hepatic disease 10 . History allergy NSAID triptan 11 . History gastritis , peptic ulcer disease , GI bleeding , gastric surgery
